name: Defy: Injustice
description:
Defy Gravity

Defy Death

Defy Injustice

Arrow Keys - Move / Jump    Space - Invert Gravity

In the year 2185, mankind is stricken with a deadly nanite plague and only one pharmaceutical Corporation has a cure. Only the most rich and powerful have the means to access the life saving drug leaving the masses to die in agony.

You must sneak in to the company's tower and steal the data crystal containing the data for the cure, but how will you get past the Corporation's sophisticated security systems?
